title: Hitting Sets Give Two-Sided Derandomization of Small Space
timeline: A manuscript was first posted online in February 2020; the paper was presented at CCC in July 2020.
version-notes: The CCC proceedings version and the ECCC version are the same except for formatting.
recognition: This paper was invited to the Theory of Computing special issue for CCC 2020.
Oded Goldreich discusses the paper in this blog post.
